doc:
Vondie Curtis-Hall https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vondie_Curtis-Hall 0 Vondie Curtis-Hall (born September 30, 1950) is an American actor, screenwriter, film director and television director. As an actor, he is known for his role as Dr. Dennis Hancock on the CBS medical drama Chicago Hope created by David E. Kelley and as Ben Urich in the Netflix TV series Marvel's Daredevil. He wrote, directed and starred in the cult film Gridlock'd. Vondie_Curtis-Hall ( born September_30_,_1950 ) is an_American_actor , screenwriter , film_director_and_television_director . As an_actor , he is_known for his_role as Dr._Dennis_Hancock on the_CBS_medical_drama_Chicago_Hope created by David_E._Kelley and as Ben_Urich in the_Netflix_TV_series_Marvel 's_Daredevil . He wrote , directed and starred in the_cult_film_Gridlock_'d .
